paper_abstract: In this manuscript, we introduce novel carry lookahead (CIA) and parallel-prefix architectures for the design of modulo 2(n) + 1 adders with operands ill the diminished-1 number representation. The proposed architectures are based on the use of Ling carries' computation units and they lead to faster and/or smaller adders than the already known ones that are based on the traditional carry signals.
